text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly states that Italy is a signatory to the Berne Convention in Section I, under the heading 'Establish Copyright Ownership,' noting that copyright arises automatically upon creation, which is a core principle derived from the Berne Convention's automatic protection mandate.", "criterion_id": "5795bc01-b551-4f04-b9e4-4598d1ccee69"}
